spell_tooltip.description: Deep Breath forms curtains of fire, preventing line of sight to enemies outside its walls and burning enemies who walk through them for 667,399 Fire damage. Lasts 6 sec.
While Obsidian Scales is active you gain immunity to interrupt, silence, and pushback effects.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 40%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 642,665, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 193,492. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 311,952 upon removing any effect.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Disorient an enemy for 20 sec, causing them to sleep walk towards you. Damage has a chance to awaken them.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 160,153 when cast.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5 sec.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 237,949 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Azure Strike has a 15% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Pyre's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.

Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing 937,568 Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within 25 yds when empowered.

I:   Damages 2 enemies.

II:  Damages 4 enemies.

III: Damages 6 enemies.

Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at 3 enemies within 25 yds.

For 18 sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to 100%, and you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Deep Breath's damage is increased by 20%.
Disintegrate deals 16% more damage.
Casting an empower spell extends the duration of Dragonrage by 5 sec, up to a maximum of 20 sec.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Fire Breath deals 30% more damage.
Eternity Surge and Shattering Star hit twice as many targets.
Eternity Surge deals 15% increased damage to your primary target.
While channeling Disintegrate your Fire Breath on the target deals damage 100% more often.
During Deep Breath and Dragonrage you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Your Blue damage increases the damage of your next Pyre by 5%, stacking 20 times.

Exhale bolts of concentrated power from your mouth at 2 enemies for 262,475 Spellfrost damage that cracks the targets' defenses, increasing the damage they take from you by 20% for 4 sec.

Grants Essence Burst.
Fire Breath damage has 16% chance to cause your next Living Flame to be instant cast, stacking 2 times.
Deep Breath's cooldown is reduced by 1 min.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 230% damage instead of the usual 200%.
Casting Shattering Star grants Essence Burst.
Deep Breath reduces the Essence costs of Disintegrate and Pyre by 1 and increases their damage by 10% for 12 sec after you land.
Essence Burst increases the damage of affected spells by 15.0%.
Disintegrate ticks 1 additional time, but deals 10% less damage.
Casting an empower spell increases your Essence regeneration rate by 100% for 4 sec.

Disintegrate reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.50 sec each time it deals damage.

Pyre reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.40 sec per enemy struck, up to 2.0 sec.
Disintegrate has a 15% chance each time it deals damage to launch a level 1 Eternity Surge at 40% power.
Empower spells cause your next Disintegrate to strike up to 3 targets. When striking fewer than 3 targets, Disintegrate damage is increased by 15% for each missing target.
Black spells deal 20% increased damage.

Mass Disintegrate marks your primary target for destruction for the next 6 sec.

You and your allies have a chance to trigger a Bombardment when attacking marked targets, dealing 352,238 Volcanic damage split amongst all nearby enemies.
Entering combat grants a charge of Burnout, causing your next Living Flame to cast instantly.
Deep Breath causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from Bombardments and Essence abilities for 12 sec.
Bombardments reduce the cooldown of Deep Breath by 1 sec for each target struck, up to 3 sec.
For each second you are in combat, Azure Strike, Living Flame, and Disintegrate deal 1% increased damage, up to 15%.
Obsidian Scales reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Essence abilities extend Bombardments by 1 sec.
While Hovering, damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 10%.

Deep Breath can now be steered in your desired direction.

In addition, Deep Breath burns targets for 1.2 million Volcanic damage over 12 sec.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.

Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Living Flame deals 6% more damage and healing.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 193,492. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.

Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 311,952 upon removing any effect.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Disorient an enemy for 20 sec, causing them to sleep walk towards you. Damage has a chance to awaken them.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 160,153 when cast.
Azure Strike damages 1 additional enemy.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.

Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 237,279 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.

Azure Strike has a 15% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.

Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by 50% in the next 10 sec.
Your Leech is increased by 4%.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Green spells restore 5% more health.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Oppressing Roar removes 1 Enrage effect from each enemy, and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5 sec.
Bend time, allowing you and your allies within 40 yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next 10 sec, even if it is on cooldown.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them for 245,996 and causing your next healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at 70% of normal healing. Essence spells cannot be Echoed.

Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you for 470,111.

I:   Heals 78,718 instantly and 391,392 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 176,567 instantly and 293,544 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 274,415 instantly and 195,696 over 8 sec.

Reverse an ally's injuries, healing them for 261,438 over 12 sec.

When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.
Each cast of a Bronze spell causes your next empower spell to reach maximum level in 10% less time, stacking up to 4 times.
Living Flame has a 20% chance, and Reversion has a 15% chance to make your next Essence ability free. Stacks 2 times.

Rewind 33% of damage taken in the last 5 seconds by all allies within 40 yds. Always heals for at least 171,730.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Divert spiritual energy, healing an ally for 906,924. Jumps to injured allies within 30 yds when empowered.

I:   Heals one ally.

II:  Heals a second ally.

III: Heals a third ally.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
Stretch time around an ally for the next 8 sec, causing 50% of damage they would take to instead be dealt over 8 sec.

Commune with the Emerald Dream, restoring 20% health and 2% mana every 0.8 sec for 4.0 sec. Overhealing is transferred to an injured ally within 40 yds.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom increases your Essence regeneration rate by 100% for 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom sends out flying seedlings when it bursts, healing 1 ally up to 40 yds away for 79,641.
Fire Breath heals 5 nearby injured allies for 40% of damage done to up to 5 targets, split evenly among them.
Reversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.
Each time you gain Essence Burst, your critical heals are 230% effective instead of the usual 200% for 10 sec.
Echo replicates 50% more healing.
Verdant Embrace temporarily bonds your life with an ally, causing your healing on either partner to heal the other for 40% of the amount. Lasts 5 sec.
Reversion has 2 charges.
Casting Echo grants one stack of Ouroboros, increasing the healing of your next Emerald Blossom by 30%, stacking up to 5 times.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1.
Rewind has 2 charges, but its healing is reduced by 50%.
Dream Breath healing is increased by 30%.
Your healing is increased by 10% on targets with your Reversion.
Reversion, Time Dilation, Echo, and Temporal Anomaly last 15% longer and cost 15% less mana.

Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, healing all allies in your path for 245,996 immediately, and 190,327 over 15 sec.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.
Every 3 Emerald Blossoms leaves behind a tiny sprout which gathers 10% of your healing over 8 sec. The sprout then heals allies within 30 yds, divided evenly among targets.
